## BlockFlyoutInflater.createBlock() method

Creates a block on the given workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createBlock(blockDefinition: BlockInfo, workspace: WorkspaceSvg): BlockSvg;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  blockDefinition | [BlockInfo](./blockly.utils.toolbox.blockinfo.md) | A JSON representation of the block to create. |
|  workspace | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg.md) | The workspace to create the block on. |

**Returns:**

[BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg.md)

The newly created block.
